title: I Got Caught By An Unbelievable Pervert.

description:
Description :
        I always longed to do this I'll make you feel unbelievably good, he pants as he licks her all over while thrusting inside she knows she shouldn't do this, but it feels so amazing! Ruka Tozaki, a college student who loves flowers, befriends Takuya Yagami, the florist who works at the flower shop near her campus. Though she always thought of him like a kind and dependable older brother... a throwaway comment she makes reveals a side of him she never expected. "I love you... you're so adorable... so lovely..." Everything from his face to the words he's uttering seem completely different than usual... is he a total pervert?!
